journalEntries.entry: Downloaded pertinent programs to our computers. Listened to orientation presentation
Went through functions chapter (Book 2 Chapter 4). Went over Chapter 5 briefly in class. Started working on exercises from Chapter 6
Worked on supplementary content "Practice Logic, Conditions, and Iterating Collections" and completed exercises on repl.it. Completed lightning exercise "js-functions".

Continued working on exercises on objects from Chapter 6. Started on Chapter 7 "Building DOM Components" and started work on exercises in that chapter. Completed exercises and challenges down to "Challenge: Composition of Smaller Components"

Completed lightning exercise on factory functions. Changed exercise on the political candidate from Chapter 6 so that the functions to change the object's state are methods within the object. Updated student components exercise so that generic element generator function works with for-of loop. Styled daily journal. Learned about DOM fragments. Started learning about APIs and json.

Went over how to manipulate APIs again using Postman. Learned about 'fetch' and '.then'. Completed exercises on fetching info from local API and open source API and inserting html representation into the DOM. Book 2 Chapter 10.

journalEntries.concepts: APIs and Fetch, Mini Group Project
journalEntries.entry: Went over how to use fetch again. Did mini group project on fetching data from an open source API. Used the data to create html pages of blog posts, photos, and todo list. Used flexbox to style.
Went through chapter 12 in book 2. Worked on practice exercises and challenges in that chapter. Started working on chapter 13 exercises and challenges

journalEntries.concepts: Browser Events and Automation with Grunt
journalEntries.entry: In class, went through chapter 13 in book 2. Completed rest of the challenges in that chapter. Finised daily journal part 5. Learned about Object.create (supplementary section in book 3).

journalEntries.concepts: Networking Talk and Started Welcome to Nashville
journalEntries.entry: Listened to talk about networking. (Need to go to meetups!) Started second group project - Welcome to Nashville. Learned more about fetching from APIs and worked on getting Zomato API key to work.

Had to switch APIs for restaurants and start over on that part. Worked on getting results from API and displaying to the DOM. Got save buttons to work and itinerary to populate the selected restaurant name.
Continued working on group project. Got parks and concerts sections to render to the DOM. Got all save buttons working and got everything to show up in the intinerary.
Completed group project, presented, and went over retro. Worked on supplementary project making tic tac toe game. Caught up on daily journal entries....oops.
Covered Chapter 1 of Book 3 on factory functions. Started on practice exercises. Worked on updating LinkedIn profile.

journalEntries.concepts: Array Methods and Daily Journal Part 6
journalEntries.entry: Worked on part 6 of the daily journal and started going over array methods in class (book 3 chapter 3). Did "confunction junction" lightning exercise. Worked on LinkedIn profile. (1st draft due tomorrow!)

Covered array methods from book 3 chapter 3: forEach, map, filter, find, sort, every, some, includes, reduce. Reduce is complicated, but seems useful. Learned about code snippets in VS Code. Kept working on daily journal part 6. Started working on practice exercises for this chapter.

journalEntries.concepts: Daily Journal Part 7 and Array Methods
journalEntries.entry: Worked on Daily Journal Part 7 and started working on practice exercises in array methods chapter (chapter 5)
